content:
Gaathram bhaagikkunneram-thannatthaane shodhippin
Snehithanil kopampoondon-gaathram kaikkondeedolla

Gaathratthinmeethe theeyum-kaasaamel jvaalayumundu
Pattakkaaran thanmaddhye-mochanakarmmam cheyyunnu.

Martthyarkkum daivatthinnum-maddhyasthhan pattakkaaran
Shaapam vaidikanekunnon-raapakalarhikkum shaapam

Sooryan chandran thaarangall-pardaisaa than vrkshangall
Aa dushdanu kashdam cholli-shaashvathashaapam nalkeedum.
